webspider.core.crawler
Class CrawlerImpl

java.lang.Object
  webspider.core.crawler.CrawlerImpl

public class CrawlerImpl
extends java.lang.Object

That class implements a web crawler to map a site structure.

getActiveLinkQueue

public java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.net.URL> getActiveLinkQueue()

isParseable

public boolean isParseable(java.net.URLConnection connection)
Checks that a given url connection is parsable. A connection is parasable if it has a content type MIME declaration, is of type text/* and is not javascript or css.

Parameters:
connection - the connection to check
